title: Business Insurance 1
overview: This course focuses on fundamental and specialized knowledge about commercial insurance, including an overview of commercial insurance, life insurance, money insurance, motor vehicle insurance, and property insurance.

skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will understand the principles, nature, and characteristics of commercial insurance, as well as the content of life insurance, money insurance, motor vehicle insurance, and property insurance.

Students will be able to apply knowledge of commercial insurance, life insurance, money insurance, motor vehicle insurance, and property insurance to analyze, evaluate, and manage business operations in the insurance industry.
Students will develop research, presentation, and teamwork skills, as well as the ability to analyze and handle situations.
Students will demonstrate independence in work and responsibility towards their group.
